com.gruppe16.database

Class DBConnect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gruppe16.database.DBConnect

  • public class DBConnect
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class DBConnect. Connects to the database, after getting log in information. Has several functions for changing and retrieving data from the database.

                                                                  com.gruppe16.entities.Appointment appointment)

        appointmentDate - the appointment date
        fromTime - the time the appointment is scheduled to begin
        toTime - the time the appointment is scheduled to end
        appointment - the appointment
        Returns:
        a list of available rooms
